content:
#!/opt/universal/python3.6/bin/python3

import random
import string

random_value = ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_uppercase + string.digits, k=10))
file_name = "/tmp/tmpfile1_{random_value}.txt".format(random_value=random_value)
with open(file_name, "w") as f:
    f.write(random_value)
